Sentencas: To satisfy the future needs of electrical power in passenger cars and trucks, Webasto AG develops an auxiliary power unit (APU), based on a high temperature solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC).
Titulo: On-board diesel fuel processing for an SOFC-APU -: Technical challenges for catalysis and reactor design

Sentencas: The fuel gas for the stack is generated by catalytic partial oxidation (CPO) of diesel fuel, using a reformer without an additional water supply.
